entry.title: instant confirmation via payment protocol backwards compatible proto buffer extension
entry.summary: In a discussion thread, Mike Hearn urges the community to focus on writing code to solve problems instead of blocking alternative approaches. He believes that if Bitcoin is robust, the market will sort it out. The discussion revolves around the implementation of a BIP (Bitcoin Improvement Proposal) which will be scheduled in XBTerminal. The proposed solution is considered the best one to date for the problem at hand. However, the discussion becomes sidetracked by philosophical debates about the future of Bitcoin and its potential vulnerabilities. Mike Hearn reminds everyone to stay on topic and continue discussing the BIP itself.
